body: Here is the manual fix: [](http://api.ning.com:80/files/UNdbGkqHoSqbv2KSOm2XU0e7V9nB8V9bb3ZmtI1Eg-x9SIvlCOLa8Wsq3nBJyoc2TlUtFmfsCy7hCjG1ltQhYOGdJtEsfmq7/header_fix_multiple_states.PNG) I will fix it in the code soon but this can help you go forward with Daysim files itself. I'm not sure how results reader would work in this case. Not sure if I have ever used them with 2 shading groups.
